trans-unit.source: Provides the managed definition of the `STATDATA` structure.
The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STATDATA> structure is the data structure used to specify each advisory connection.
It is used for enumerating current advisory connections.
For more information about the `STATDATA` structure, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT.
For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).
Represents the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ADVF"></xref> enumeration value that determines when the advisory sink is notified of changes in the data.
For more information about the `STATDATA` structure, see the MSDN Library.
Represents the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink"></xref> interface that will receive change notifications.
For more information about the `STATDATA` structure, see the MSDN Library.
Represents the token that uniquely identifies the advisory connection.
This token is returned by the method that sets up the advisory connection.
For more information about the `STATDATA` structure, see the MSDN Library.
Represents the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC"></xref> structure for the data of interest to the advise sink.
The advise sink receives notification of changes to the data specified by this <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC"></xref> structure.
For more information about the `STATDATA` structure, see the MSDN Library.
